question:
Which of the following is / are correct statements with respect to the RTI (Right to Information Act), 2005?
  1. This act is applicable in all states of India
  2. It exempts Below Poverty Line (BPL) people from Payment of RTI Fees.
  3. It allows request of only one information in a single application
Which of the above is / are correct statements?
explanation:
This act is applicable in all states of India
This is incorrect statement. As per section 1(2), the act is not applicable in Jammu & Kashmir.
It exempts Below Poverty Line (BPL) people from Payment of RTI Fees.
This is a correct statement and is a notable point.
It allows request of only one information in a single application
This is incorrect because one can ask for more than one information in a single application.
